definition: main stream (of a river)/fig. the essential point/main viewpoint of a matter/mainstream (culture etc)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: According to Polson, bands' music changes when they go mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 波爾森表示，樂隊在走向主流後，音樂發生了變化。

sentences.english: The contemporary art esteems vigorously which by US occupies the mainstream status forcefully.
sentences.chinese: 由美國極力推崇的當代藝術強行佔據主流地位。

sentences.english: Domestically, no cyanogen zinc acid salt galvanized is still the mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 就國內而言，無氰鋅酸鹽鍍鋅仍是主流。

sentences.english: During the Song Dynasty, reforming became the main current in the intellectual and political circle.
sentences.chinese: 兩宋時期，求變思潮成爲思想界與政治界的主流。

sentences.english: Then how do the mainstream economic theories of the Western world describe the relating of regional economy?
sentences.chinese: 西方主流經濟學說如何描述區域經濟關聯？

sentences.english: Their part-gasoline-part-electric functionality has brought the whole concept of being "carbon sensitive" into the mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 它半油半電的機能使結碳意識的完整概念馳皙主流。

sentences.english: This tone has prevailed through subsequent commemorations and debates.
sentences.chinese: 這一基調在過去的紀念活動和辯論中成爲主流。

sentences.english: How to enjoy the fashionable life of the elites?
sentences.chinese: 如何暢享主流精英階層時尚生活？

sentences.english: yay.), research into the effectiveness of mainstream games is still in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 而關於主流遊戲對人們幫助的研究還處於初級階段。

sentences.english: There are two basic designs of sprue puller .
sentences.chinese: 有二種基本的主流道拉料機構設計方法。

sentences.english: Learn how to harden the major operating systems and develop an understanding of hacking techniques.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何加強主流操作系統和發展對黑客技術的理解。

sentences.english: It's a chance for Poland to be in the mainstream of the EU, and to be engaged in global affairs, " Balcer noted."
sentences.chinese: 這是波蘭融入歐盟主流，參與全球事務的一個機會。

sentences.english: In the Chinese ancient times the cautious punishment was its mainstream thought of its legal thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代法中慎刑思想是其主流思想。

sentences.english: I rub, after 90 eggs of non-mainstream'm really hurt, not to force ah.
sentences.chinese: 我擦，90後非主流真叫人蛋疼，不給力啊。

sentences.english: Irony is beginning to make some incursions into the straight-faced bastion of mainstream print media.
sentences.chinese: 反諷正在入侵一些面無表情的主流印刷媒體。

sentences.english: Fibonacci jumped into the technical mainstream late in thebullmarket.
sentences.chinese: 菲波納奇在牛市的後期一躍而成爲技術主流。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
